title.rendered: Digiperform launches its 27th Centre in Hyderabad

content.rendered:
Digiperform launches its 27th Centre in Hyderabad

Hyderabad (means “Haydar’s city” or “lion city”) is known as one of the major IT hubs of the World. It has all the amenities that a city should possess and blessed with great talents as well as career-oriented people. As Digiperform aims to spread its wings all over PAN India cities, its feel delighted to announce the opening of our new center in Hyderabad. The center launched on 11th July – 2018 followed by a great ceremony. Here is the glimpse:

 

About Digiperform:

Digiperform is Digital Marketing Training Company that solely aims at imparting online marketing skill training to a million people and help them to achieve the best in their business as well as career. There are multiple of certification training programs offered by Digiperform to fresh graduates, working professionals, and wannabe entrepreneurs, enabling them to be self-employed, get placed in top organizations & understand the operation of Digital Marketing to run their own empires.

Digiperform Highlights:

  • Awarded as “Most Trusted Brand in Digital Education”
  • Award Winning LMS
  • Strong Foundation
  • India’s only certified Trainers
  • 15 certifications including 3 Digiperform Certifications
  • 100% Placement Assistance

excerpt.rendered: As Digiperform aims to spread its wings all over PAN India cities, its feel delighted to announce the opening of our new center in Hyderabad. The center launched on 11th July – 2018 followed by a great ceremony.
